resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104987</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104987</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205902</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Grapes of Wrath Scrapbook</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trauben von Zornznszscrapbook</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Raisins d'album à colère</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uvas do scrapbook do wrath</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uva dell'album di wrath</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σταφύλια του λευκώματος αποκομμάτων οργής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Uvas del libro de recuerdos de la cólera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">aims to enhance reading and understanding of The Grapes of Wrath through ethnographic research -- collections of sound recordings, drawings, photos, fieldnotes, and correspondence. Students show how cultural artifacts support one of themes in the novel.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ziele, zum des Messwertes und des Verständnisses 
der Trauben des Zorns durch ethnographische Forschung zu 
erhöhen -- Ansammlungen der Tonaufnahmen, der Zeichnungen, der Fotos,
der fieldnotes und der Korrespondenz. Kursteilnehmer zeigen, wie
kulturelle Kunstprodukte eins von Themen im Roman unterstützen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objectifs pour mettre en valeur la lecture et 
l'arrangement des raisins de la colère par la recherche 
ethnographique -- collections d'enregistrements sonores, de schémas, 
de photos, de fieldnotes, et de correspondance. Les étudiants 
montrent comment les objets façonnés culturels supportent un de 
thèmes dans le roman.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alvos para realçar a leitura e a compreensão das
uvas do wrath com a pesquisa ethnographic -- coleções de gravações
sadias, de desenhos, de fotos, de fieldnotes, e de correspondência. 
Os estudantes mostram como os artifacts cultural suportam um dos
temas na novela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">obiettivi per aumentare lettura e comprensione 
dell'uva di wrath con ricerca ethnographic -- collezioni di 
registrazioni del suono, di illustrazioni, di foto, di fieldnotes e di
corrispondenza. Gli allievi mostrano come i manufatti culturali 
sostengono uno dei temi nel romanzo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στόχοι να ενισχυθεί η ανάγνωση και η κατανόηση των 
σταφυλιών της οργής μέσω της εθνογραφικής έρευνας -- συλλογές 
των υγιών καταγραφών, των σχεδίων, των φωτογραφιών, fieldnotes,
και της αλληλογραφίας. Οι σπουδαστές επιδεικνύουν πώς τα 
πολιτιστικά χειροποίητα αντικείμενα υποστηρίζουν ένα από τα 
θέματα στο μυθιστόρημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">punterías para realzar la lectura y la 
comprensión de las uvas de la cólera con la investigación 
etnográfica -- colecciones de grabaciones de sonidos, de gráficos, de
fotos, de fieldnotes, y de correspondencia. Los estudiantes 
muestran cómo los artefactos culturales utilizan uno de temas en la 
novela.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205902</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104987</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/grapes-of-wrath-scrapbook</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
